item.title: Getting The Current Page in Phoenix Framework
item.description: When programming in Phoenix Framework, you sometimes need to code a decision point based on the current page. To do this, we can make use of Plug.Conn’s path_info field and compare it with Routes. Let’s say you have the following piece of code: <%= if is_accounts_page(@conn) %> <div> # Account related content </div> <% end %> To find out if the user is in the account route, you can compare the current path with the Account page route in LayoutView:
